name: Apecalypse
description:
Description

Apecalypse is a horror game game developed for Samsung Gear VR. This is a web build that does not fully reflect the VR experience.

In Apecalypse you are a guard that wakes up after your ship has wrecked. The creature you were guarding has escaped and there is no sign of any member of the crew. Find your way out... before it finds you.

Gameplay

Try to escape into the light. Game will restart when you die or win.

  • Look around with mouse
  • Move with W and D
  • Pickup and use objects by clicking on them
Team

Made during Fall Game Jam 2016 by

  • Jesper Tingvall
  • Adam Green
  • Daniel Tordera
  • Anders Dahnielson
  • Sara Erenius
  • Simon Schmiedt
  • Carl Dehlin
